sql.name: hbeoms.allformsecoundpfrolenamepfu
sql.item: select distinct(t.c1),t.c700000001,t.c700000003 as 工单编号,t.c700000006 as 建单时间,t.c700000004 as 建单人,t.c700000011 as 主题,t.c700000015 as 紧急程度,t.c700000014 as 所属专业,t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1000} t,{100} log where t.C1=log.c700020407 and t.c700000001=log.c700020408 {1} {2} {3} {4} --order by t.c700000003 union all select distinct(t.c1),t.c700000001,t.c700000003 as 工单编号,t.c700000006 as 建单时间,t.c700000004 as 建单人,t.c700000011 as 主题,t.c700000015 as 紧急程度,t.c700000014 as 所属专业,t.c700000010 as 工单状态 from {1000} t,{200} log where t.C1=log.c700020407 and t.c700000001=log.c700020408 {1} {2} {3} {4} --order by t.c700000003

sql.name: qheoms.twotypeformsumnewformnamecarful1
sql.item: select 't'||t.schemaid,BaseCategory.C650000001 as basechname, BaseCategory.C650000002 as basename from {500} BaseCategory,arschema t where t.name=BaseCategory.C650000002 and t.schemaid={5}
